title: Looking for Dummy Hoy cards and items

posts.post_title: Looking for Dummy Hoy cards and items
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott
I'm interested in purchasing any Dummy Hoy cards (graded with a # grade) or items that anyone might be willing to part with.  If you have anything, please contact me at scottg@accessmfgsys.com.
Thanks,
Scott.

posts.post_title: Looking for Dummy Hoy cards and items
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott
Thank you for all that responded.  I am expanding my search to include Dummy Taylor items.  I am most interested in N172 Hoy cards and T206 Taylor cards with rare backs.
Scott.
